label: ham
subject: Re: [R] erratic behavior of match()?
body: 80 (return) [ This circle of wagons, the _Carrago_, was the usual fortification of the Barbarians. (Vegetius de Re Militari, l. iii. c. 10. Valesius ad Ammian. xxxi. 7.) The practice and the name were preserved by their descendants as late as the fifteenth century. The _Charroy_, which surrounded the _Ost_, is a word familiar to the readers of Froissard, or Comines.]
